actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide increased penalties for distribution of heroin by certain persons, and to provide for pretrial detention of such persons.

summary.text: Provides, under the provisions of the Controlled Substances Act, for increased penalties for distribution of heroin by persons who are not themselves addicts. Provides for pretrial detention of such persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide increased penalties for distribution of heroin by certain persons, and to provide for pretrial detention of such persons.
